Recognition

Signs You've Outgrown Housecall Pro

You're not alone—most teams hit these walls around 5-10 technicians

Calendar Scheduling Struggles

"Job scheduling tools become inefficient with larger teams"

Calendar view works great for 5 techs, but gets chaotic with 12-truck operations. No capacity planning, crew management, or advanced routing. Users report it "makes it challenging to oversee multiple crews simultaneously."

"Lack of map-based scheduling"

Makes dispatching more difficult as your service area expands and you need route optimization for multiple crews.

Limited Automation Features

"Automated workflows feel restrictive in standard plan"

Still manually booking calls, coordinating schedules, sending follow-ups. Pipeline and campaign management are separate charges. Users report needing Zapier for basic automations that should be built-in.

"AI features not native to platform"

No AI-powered dispatching, no smart scheduling recommendations, no automated customer communications beyond basic templates.

Limited Job Costing & Reporting

"Invoicing restraints make remit payment near impossible to track"

Can see revenue but not true profitability. No granular analysis per job, tech, or customer. Users report that invoices "do not allow lump sum reports internally," forcing them to rely on spreadsheets to understand margins.

"Enhanced reporting costs extra"

Advanced analytics and custom reports require higher-tier plans or add-ons, increasing your monthly costs as you need better insights.

Multi-Location Challenges

"Outgrew it when we opened location #2"

Real user quote. Software "does not let us add many jobs/location to one customer." No location-specific dispatch, pricebooks, or reporting. Managing multiple branches requires workarounds.

"Issues with some larger customers having many jobs or locations"

Users trying to "set up multiple locations for two HCP accounts" report "run into several challenges with support," with support saying "he's not the right point of contact for setting up multiple locations."

Deep Dive

What Actually Changes When You Upgrade

Everything Housecall Pro should have built for scaling teams

Enterprise Dispatch vs Calendar Chaos

The Housecall Pro Scheduling Reality

  • Calendar view becomes chaotic after 5 technicians

    Users report it "makes it challenging to oversee multiple crews simultaneously" and scheduling interface "becomes inefficient with larger teams"

  • No map-based scheduling or route optimization

    "Lack of map-based scheduling makes dispatching more difficult" as your service area expands

  • No capacity planning or crew management

    Can't see technician availability, skill sets, or workload at a glance

  • Limited to basic calendar interface

    No drag-and-drop optimization, no what-if scenarios, no intelligent suggestions

The Thorbis Scheduling Advantage

  • Enterprise dispatch board that scales to 500+ technicians

    Map-based visualization, drag-and-drop optimization, real-time capacity planning

  • AI-powered route optimization and smart scheduling

    Automatically suggests best routes, minimizes drive time, balances workload across teams

  • Crew management and skill-based assignment

    Match jobs to technicians based on skills, certifications, location, and availability

  • Real-time capacity forecasting

    See exactly how many jobs you can handle today, this week, this month

Bottom Line: Handle 10x more technicians without 10x more chaos

Implementation

Your 30-Day Migration Path

Smooth transition without disrupting your operations

Phase 1
Days 1-10: Setup & Import

Data migration from Housecall Pro (customers, jobs, invoices)

Team accounts and permission setup

Pricebook and service catalog configuration

Integration setup (QuickBooks, payment processing)

Phase 2
Days 11-20: Training & Testing

Office staff training (CSRs, dispatchers, managers)

Technician mobile app training

Test workflows with real jobs (parallel with HCP)

Customer portal and communication testing

Phase 3
Days 21-30: Go Live

Switch all new jobs to Thorbis

Monitor performance and address questions

Optimize workflows based on team feedback

Full Housecall Pro retirement (save on subscription)

Start your migration
